tags: dont lose hope in dan and phil
summary:
Reasons why you shouldn’t lose hope in Dan and Phil~ 💕 >•<
1. This is one of the most plausible reasons, and it is that...Dan...
body:
Reasons why you shouldn’t lose hope in Dan and Phil~ 💕 >•<

1. This is one of the most plausible reasons, and it is that…Dan and Phil are simply starting a new era~ They have mentioned several times that new things are coming, and that they aren’t leaving anytime soon~ Think of it like a show where Season 1 has ended, and they’re in the process of making Season 2~

2. Interactive Introverts~ Remember that world tour that the both of them did FOR their audience, themed ALL AROUND their audience, and giving the people what they want? They’ve given us so much…now we are letting them have what they want~ They don’t owe us anything~

3. This reason is for those who believe Dan and Phil are in a relationship. There is no reason to believe they’ve split up. Why would Dan have taken Phil’s merch pictures if one of them had just moved out and left? Taking photos of someone is, inmany ways, very very affectionate~ Capturing the beauty of the one you love~ And just because they don’t go everywhere together, it doesn’t mean they’re over. Do you go everywhere all the time with your S.O.? Didn’t think so. Did I mention Phil still mentions Dan in his videos? Why would he mention someone he was trying to forget? It only makes sense that they’re doing fine~ Or better yet, they’re happier than ever because they’re living more life off camera and for themselves~

4. This is to all who believe the “Dan and Phil” branding is dead, and that they will no longer collaborate. Now tell me…did they say DanAndPhilGAMES was done? Nope~! They went on hiatus. Now I know they ended Dan vs. Phil, PINOF, Baking ( for now ), the 7 second challenge app…etc. But do you know what they said or mentioned after every one of those cancellations? That there are NEW THINGS COMING~ TRY NEW THINGS~ Don’t forget that~!! This is the NEW ERA of Dan and Phil~! Get excited~! “Now, onto the future”~

5. Now…to everyone not liking the “lack of communication”. I’ll make this simple…Dan is on hiatus. As is the gaming channel. Dan isn’t really using the internet, which is FINE. Did you know that people can live without telling everyone what they’re doing? That’s what Dan is doing~ He doesn’t “owe us an explanation”. If anything, we owe him the support~ And…why is everyone harassing Phil with questions? Yes, he’s the closest person to Dan, but is it his choice to talk about what Dan is doing? No, it’s Dan’s. Phil doesn’t need to say anything. He’s being an ANGEL giving us all this content, and everyone is overlooking that. Phil is probably frequently talking with Dan behind the scenes, and helping him out. Now that’s a personal thing…and he doesn’t need to tell us anything about his interactions with Dan. They’re living more privately and that’s nothing but good~ Good for them~ : )

6. Phil’s content is JUST AS AMAZING, or even BETTER THAN IT USED TO BE~ It’s only grown with his personality and interests, and he STILL LOVES WHAT HE DOES~ He would post much less, and with very little smiles and laughs if he didn’t love his job~ The only reason people believe he “doesn’t like making vids” anymore is because he isn’t answering the questions they want him to answer, and for some reason they see that as him being ignorant or defensive? He doesn’t have to answer those questions, and he doesn’t owe us those answers either. We owe him support and smiles~ I personally have been frickin LOVING Phil’s recent content~! He is such a sunshine and a blessing~! Do you know how much he has been giving us, and how well he’s been supporting us during this hiatus~? He is working HARD~! And if that doesn’t mean he loves his fans then I don’t know what does~ Don’t use your want for “communication” as an excuse to not like Phil’s content~ He’s only changed for the better, and he isn’t going anywhere~

7. Another point on Dan and his hiatus: him and Phil had been going NONSTOP the whole of 2018. In the mukbang, Dan DID talk about why he hadn’t posted yet. The algorithm, where he wants to go with his content, him growing as a person…etc. And do you NOT remember that he still struggles with depression? When depressed, motivation is nonexistent. If that is yet ANOTHER thing happening, it’s building up along with his other reasons, and making it harder for him to come back. Now do you think implying he is “dead”, and attacking him with constant question is gong to help that? Just remember that Dan is a human being, and has the right to take as long as he wants. Just because he’s working on himself doesn’t mean he’s leaving. Don’t lose hope in Dan. He’s got some big, amazing things coming~ Remember the writers retreat he attended~? Yeah, that’s a thing~! Another reason it may be taking him longer, a GOOD reason~! I just know he has big things planned, and when he comes back…we should welcome him with open arms~ No complaints about “how long he was gone” or the “lack of communication”, but cheers and support~ Love and excitement~ :’)

8. There are so many other reasons, but I will make this my final point because I don’t want to drag this thread on too long. Dan and Phil..they care for their fans so much~ most likely more than any other YouTubers~ I know barely anyone who has gone on 2 tours for their audience, with so much work and love put into them~ I know barely anyone who has been so helpful, honest, genuine, and supportive to their audience~ Live shows in which they give someone advice or help someone out~ Hugging a fan crying outside that they didn’t even know~ ( this actually happened it was so v v precious~ ) Innumerable meet and greets, with the same amount of easygoing energy and kindness each time~ Eating pizza for over 30 minutes ranting about how much they loved doing tour for their audience~ Making their tour into a film edited by them, for all those who couldn’t come to the tour~ Supporting mental health charities, and even being an ambassador~ ( Dan~ ) Writing a book about how much they loved their journey with each other and their audience~ So many other things~ Everyone…don’t forget or dismiss all they’ve done for us. All they may have done for you personally. Making you happy~ Helping you through hard times in your life~ Keeping you from your crippling depression or easing your anxiety~ Helping you stay strong through those tough times~ Making you laugh and smile when it seemed near impossible~

Dan and Phil gave us their world…

don’t you think we owe them that too~? 🌈💕

1. This is one of the most plausible reasons, and it is that…Dan and Phil are simply starting a new era~ They have mentioned several times that new things are coming, and that they aren’t leaving anytime soon~ Think of it like a show where Season 1 has ended, and they’re in the process of making Season 2~

2. Interactive Introverts~ Remember that world tour that the both of them did FOR their audience, themed ALL AROUND their audience, and giving the people what they want? They’ve given us so much…now we are letting them have what they want~ They don’t owe us anything~

3. This reason is for those who believe Dan and Phil are in a relationship. There is no reason to believe they’ve split up. Why would Dan have taken Phil’s merch pictures if one of them had just moved out and left? Taking photos of someone is, inmany ways, very very affectionate~ Capturing the beauty of the one you love~ And just because they don’t go everywhere together, it doesn’t mean they’re over. Do you go everywhere all the time with your S.O.? Didn’t think so. Did I mention Phil still mentions Dan in his videos? Why would he mention someone he was trying to forget? It only makes sense that they’re doing fine~ Or better yet, they’re happier than ever because they’re living more life off camera and for themselves~

4. This is to all who believe the “Dan and Phil” branding is dead, and that they will no longer collaborate. Now tell me…did they say DanAndPhilGAMES was done? Nope~! They went on hiatus. Now I know they ended Dan vs. Phil, PINOF, Baking ( for now ), the 7 second challenge app…etc. But do you know what they said or mentioned after every one of those cancellations? That there are NEW THINGS COMING~ TRY NEW THINGS~ Don’t forget that~!! This is the NEW ERA of Dan and Phil~! Get excited~! “Now, onto the future”~

5. Now…to everyone not liking the “lack of communication”. I’ll make this simple…Dan is on hiatus. As is the gaming channel. Dan isn’t really using the internet, which is FINE. Did you know that people can live without telling everyone what they’re doing? That’s what Dan is doing~ He doesn’t “owe us an explanation”. If anything, we owe him the support~ And…why is everyone harassing Phil with questions? Yes, he’s the closest person to Dan, but is it his choice to talk about what Dan is doing? No, it’s Dan’s. Phil doesn’t need to say anything. He’s being an ANGEL giving us all this content, and everyone is overlooking that. Phil is probably frequently talking with Dan behind the scenes, and helping him out. Now that’s a personal thing…and he doesn’t need to tell us anything about his interactions with Dan. They’re living more privately and that’s nothing but good~ Good for them~ : )

6. Phil’s content is JUST AS AMAZING, or even BETTER THAN IT USED TO BE~ It’s only grown with his personality and interests, and he STILL LOVES WHAT HE DOES~ He would post much less, and with very little smiles and laughs if he didn’t love his job~ The only reason people believe he “doesn’t like making vids” anymore is because he isn’t answering the questions they want him to answer, and for some reason they see that as him being ignorant or defensive? He doesn’t have to answer those questions, and he doesn’t owe us those answers either. We owe him support and smiles~ I personally have been frickin LOVING Phil’s recent content~! He is such a sunshine and a blessing~! Do you know how much he has been giving us, and how well he’s been supporting us during this hiatus~? He is working HARD~! And if that doesn’t mean he loves his fans then I don’t know what does~ Don’t use your want for “communication” as an excuse to not like Phil’s content~ He’s only changed for the better, and he isn’t going anywhere~

7. Another point on Dan and his hiatus: him and Phil had been going NONSTOP the whole of 2018. In the mukbang, Dan DID talk about why he hadn’t posted yet. The algorithm, where he wants to go with his content, him growing as a person…etc. And do you NOT remember that he still struggles with depression? When depressed, motivation is nonexistent. If that is yet ANOTHER thing happening, it’s building up along with his other reasons, and making it harder for him to come back. Now do you think implying he is “dead”, and attacking him with constant question is gong to help that? Just remember that Dan is a human being, and has the right to take as long as he wants. Just because he’s working on himself doesn’t mean he’s leaving. Don’t lose hope in Dan. He’s got some big, amazing things coming~ Remember the writers retreat he attended~? Yeah, that’s a thing~! Another reason it may be taking him longer, a GOOD reason~! I just know he has big things planned, and when he comes back…we should welcome him with open arms~ No complaints about “how long he was gone” or the “lack of communication”, but cheers and support~ Love and excitement~ :’)

8. There are so many other reasons, but I will make this my final point because I don’t want to drag this thread on too long. Dan and Phil..they care for their fans so much~ most likely more than any other YouTubers~ I know barely anyone who has gone on 2 tours for their audience, with so much work and love put into them~ I know barely anyone who has been so helpful, honest, genuine, and supportive to their audience~ Live shows in which they give someone advice or help someone out~ Hugging a fan crying outside that they didn’t even know~ ( this actually happened it was so v v precious~ ) Innumerable meet and greets, with the same amount of easygoing energy and kindness each time~ Eating pizza for over 30 minutes ranting about how much they loved doing tour for their audience~ Making their tour into a film edited by them, for all those who couldn’t come to the tour~ Supporting mental health charities, and even being an ambassador~ ( Dan~ ) Writing a book about how much they loved their journey with each other and their audience~ So many other things~ Everyone…don’t forget or dismiss all they’ve done for us. All they may have done for you personally. Making you happy~ Helping you through hard times in your life~ Keeping you from your crippling depression or easing your anxiety~ Helping you stay strong through those tough times~ Making you laugh and smile when it seemed near impossible~

Dan and Phil gave us their world…

don’t you think we owe them that too~? 🌈💕

tags: cant stand to see people already thinking he’s going to definitely upload
summary:
Mates, please calm down
He said he’s “hoping” to “perhaps” upload in June.
Please, please don’t get the idea that he is...
body:
Mates, please calm down

He said he’s “hoping” to “perhaps” upload in June.

Please, please don’t get the idea that he is definitely uploading!!! Otherwise we run into the same problems we have had in the past, when he regrets telling us anything because we spin his words into something he didn’t say and then we get angry when he doesn’t do what he said he wouldn’t do!!

I am just as excited that he is planning to come back, but give him some space to breathe. If he doesn’t end up uploading, please be kind and understanding. He didn’t guarantee it. He just said he would try. So treat it that way, okay?

reblog.comment:

I am just as excited that he is planning to come back, but give him some space to breathe. If he doesn’t end up uploading, please be kind and understanding. He didn’t guarantee it. He just said he would try. So treat it that way, okay?

I am just as excited that he is planning to come back, but give him some space to breathe. If he doesn’t end up uploading, please be kind and understanding. He didn’t guarantee it. He just said he would try. So treat it that way, okay?

Please, please don’t get the idea that he is definitely uploading!!! Otherwise we run into the same problems we have had in the past, when he regrets telling us anything because we spin his words into something he didn’t say and then we get angry when he doesn’t do what he said he wouldn’t do!!

I am just as excited that he is planning to come back, but give him some space to breathe. If he doesn’t end up uploading, please be kind and understanding. He didn’t guarantee it. He just said he would try. So treat it that way, okay?
